turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, I'm trying to order some pizzas from Bella Luna.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Hi, what can I do for you?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure! I can help

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what kind of pizza would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Need two small pizzas. One with half pepper and pepperoni, the other half.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Sausage and pepperoni. And then on the other pizza, I want.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Just extra cheese. And also, do you do you know if they offer a gluten-free crust?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: They go offer a gluten free crust.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: They do or don't? I'm sorry.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes they do offer a gluten free crust.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great. Make them both gluten-free crusts, as well.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Certainly.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: for the 2nd pizza you're only looking for extra cheese on the pizza?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: It is.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: is that correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: plain, extra cheese.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great! thanks for confirming.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No problem.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: give me a moment to summarize your order and ready it back to you.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I've got 2 gluten free pizzas.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Two small gluten-free pizzas, did you get the small part?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: yes i did! 2 small pizzas. the first is 1/2 pepper pepperoni, 1/2 sausage pepperoni and the second one is extra cheese only.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay. Did you get green peppers for the first half of the first pizza? I only heard pepper twice.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Oh i see! I did not. let me add that.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: All right, thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: not a problem!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: thank you for your patience!

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Mhm.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: So to repeat the first pissa is 1/2 green peppers and pepperoni, 1/2 sausage pepperoni and the second pizzas is extra cheese only.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Make it for the first pizza, green peppers and pepperoni. And then half the other half sausage.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: If that makes sense.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure! I'll change it for you!

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Sounds like you Yeah. All right. Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: So the 1st pizza is 1/2 green peppers and pepperoni, and the other 1/2 is sausage only.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yep, that's right. You got it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great! thank you so much!

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Mhm.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: would you like me to read the other back to you one more time?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Sure.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great!

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: 2 small gluten free pizzas1/2 green peppers and pepperoni, and the other 1/2 is sausage only.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, and then another You got it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: and one extra cheese pizza.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Let me get the total for you.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: The total for these two pizzas will be $35.88.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That's fine.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: is that alright?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great! let me submit this for you!

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay, thank you very much.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I'm glad i can help!

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I appreciate it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Your order has been sent to Bella Luna and is being prepared. Your order should be ready for pickup soon.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: All right, thank you very much.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: you're welcome.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I hope you enjoy your meal!

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I do, too.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Bye bye!

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Goodbye.

items.name: Make it for the first pizz
